umediaSlider.nodeName: You can (of course) change these images!
umediaSlider.teaserText:
When you installed this skin, we added a new node to your content area called "frontpage slider", go there to change the image, text and link in this slider

What colors?

umediaSlider.nodeName: And changing the colors is easy as well!
